author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
For the blade of Adam's Crouching Tiger Green Destiny Sword replica, he wants to get the edges sharpened enough to look movie accurate, not just aesthetically, but also practically as a safe-to-handle prop. To accomplish that, Adam works on the etched blade with a new knife sharpening system that's a favorite of his maker friends. 

Part 1 of Adam's Crouching Tiger Green Destiny Sword Build: https://youtu.be/i7MtPEPD_YY
TSPROF Knife Sharpener kit: https://amzn.to/4oZkCaa

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Joey Fameli
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Sharpens His Crouching Tiger Sword Blade!
